snippet:
J. C. Penney  doesn’t have many fans on Wall Street. But a big one emerged on Thursday:  George Soros .
   
Mr. Soros, the hedge fund billionaire, on Thursday disclosed a 7.9 percent stake in Penney, with 17.4 million shares, accord...
abstract: Hedge fund billionaire George Soros discloses 7.9 percent stake in J C Penney, or 17.4 million shares; Soros will not use stake to exert influence on embattled retailer. (M)

headline.main: Billionaire Investor Soros Buys a 7.9% Stake in J.C. Penney

snippet:
An outfit called Martian Watches has created one of the most advanced options yet to put smartphone technology on your wrist.
   
The three lines of  Martian Watches  control your Apple or Android phone through a Bluetooth connection, but ...
abstract: Gadgetwise blog; Martian Watches introduces wristwatch that can control user's Apple or Android phone through Bluetooth connection. Photo (S)

headline.main: A Watch That Speaks to Your Phone and You

snippet: The world’s largest smartphone maker said its net income reached $6.5 billion for the quarter.
abstract: Samsung Electronics reports first-quarter net income of 7.2 trillion won, or $6.5 billion, up from 5 trillion won in same period a year earlier; results significantly exceed analyst expectations.

snippet: A critical guide to plays running in New York, with special note of productions in previews or opening.
Shares rose slightly after the earnings report because the dip in profits was not as great as expected.
abstract: Amazon reports first-quarter net income of $82 million, or 18 cents a share, down from $130 million, or 28 cents a share, in same period a year earlier; profit exceeds analyst expectations, despite decline.

headline.main: Amazon’s Profit Falls as It Spends Heavily on Projects
headline.print_headline: Amazon’s Profit Falls as It Spends Heavily on Projects

snippet: The billionaire hedge fund manager George Soros disclosed a 7.9 percent stake in the embattled retailer.
abstract: The billionaire hedge fund manager George Soros disclosed a 7.9 percent stake in the embattled retailer.

headline.main: Soros Buys a 7.9% Stake in J.C. Penney
headline.print_headline: Billionaire Investor Soros Buys a 7.9% Stake in J.C. Penney

snippet: Experiments with sculpture and assemblage, more than with physics, are in the “Weird Science” group show.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews Weird Science exhibit at Jack Hanley Gallery.

snippet: Garlic mustard, a biennial herb, is a stealthy grower, proliferating throughout the city in abandoned lots, parks and across college campuses.
abstract: Garlic mustard, a biennial herb, is a stealthy grower, proliferating throughout the city in abandoned lots, parks and across college campuses.

snippet: The company’s brightening fortunes underscore how the  monetary easing pursued by the government of Prime Minister Shinzo Abe and the central bank are galvanizing exporters.
abstract: Sony doubles annual net profit estimate to 40 billion yen, or $404 million, citing weaker yen, sales of noncore assets and stock rally that has bolstered its insurance business.

headline.print_headline:
Weaker Yen Helps Sony
Raise Its Profit Outlook

snippet: Verizon is said to have hired advisers to prepare a possible $100 billion bid for Vodafone’s portion of the Verizon Wireless joint venture, Reuters reports. | Janet L. Yellen, a possible Fed successor, has admirers and foes. | Down payment rules a...
abstract: Verizon is said to have hired advisers to prepare a possible $100 billion bid for Vodafone’s portion of the Verizon Wireless joint venture, Reuters reports. | Janet L. Yellen, a possible Fed successor, has admirers and foes. | Down payment rules and the debate on mortgages. | Fiat is seeking to buy full ownership of Chrysler, according to a Wall Street Journal report.

headline.main: Verizon Is Said to Hire Advisers on Bid for Wireless Stake
